content.raw:
I have some preliminary tweaks on f489886, feel free to merge those which make sense to you. In summary:

* Improved documentation of some functions / classes
* Removed private member variables which are not used
* Calling signals instead of using `emit`
* Added `this->` to connects
* Added a few test expectations
content.html:
I have some preliminary tweaks on f489886, feel free to merge those which make sense to you. In summary:

  • Improved documentation of some functions / classes
  • Removed private member variables which are not used
  • Calling signals instead of using emit
  • Added this-> to connects
  • Added a few test expectations
